title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3.3, Phi 4, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client library for Ollama; chat, generate, create, pull, list, copy, delete models with async support.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, embeddings, and tool-calling components.

title: ollama-webui (Ollama-WebUI)
summary: Feature-rich chat WebUI for Ollama with multi-model convos, code highlighting, RAG, and admin panel.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, list models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate completions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with fuzzy model search, chat history, and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension turning Ollama models into inline code copilots with autocomplete and chat sidebar.

title: ollama-tools
summary: Collection of ready-to-use Modelfiles and tool examples (function calling) for popular open models.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration by deepset; use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-cookbook
summary: Community cookbook with recipes for tool use, structured outputs, Docker, Kubernetes, and more.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images and compose stacks for CPU & GPU (CUDA) deployments of Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Community-maintained Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + Streamlit to chat with your documents.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript client; 100k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama-pypi
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client; 300k+ monthly downloads.

title: ollama discussion: tool calling beta
summary: Active GitHub discussion tracking the new tool/function-calling beta feature and community examples.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate for Ollama with async reqwest client and typed model responses.

title: ollama-go
summary: Official Go client library for Ollama; chat, generate, pull, and manage models.
